titleInfo.title: Workshop of Jewish Family and Children's Service

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 6 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''1967, Mayor Currigan with John Kamlet at the [illegible] workshop of Jewish Family and Children's Service. Tillye Levy and United Way representative in background, #503.''

mods.abstract: Mayor Currigan and John Kamlet at a Workshop of Jewish Family and Children's Services in Denver, Colorado. Tillye Levy and a representative of the United Way can be seen in the background.
